parameter.name: pollTime
parameter.label: Poll States
parameter.description: Time in seconds of how often to fetch the state of the LEDs.

parameter.name: segmentIndex
parameter.label: Segment Index
parameter.description: Leave this as 0 if you are not using segments, otherwise set this to the segment index number that you wish to control.

parameter.name: saturationThreshold
parameter.label: Saturation Threshold
parameter.description: This feature allows you to specify a number that if the saturation drops below, will trigger white.

parameter.name: sortEffects
parameter.label: Sort Effects
parameter.description: If set, will sort the state options of the effects channel alphabetically while keeping the first option (Solid) at the top.

parameter.name: sortPalettes
parameter.label: Sort Palettes
parameter.description: If set, will sort the state options of the palettes channel alphabetically while keeping the first option (Default) at the top.

channel-type.label: Master Controls
channel-type.description: Allows you to exit FX mode and use the LEDS like a normal light

channel-type.label: Segment Brightness
channel-type.description: Changes the brightness of the whole segment

channel-type.label: Primary Color
channel-type.description: Allows you to change the primary color used in FX

channel-type.label: Primary White
channel-type.description: Changes the brightness of the primary white LED

channel-type.label: Secondary Color
channel-type.description: Allows you to change the secondary color used in FX

channel-type.label: Secondary White
channel-type.description: Changes the brightness of the secondary white LED

channel-type.label: Tertiary Color
channel-type.description: Allows you to change the third color used in FX

channel-type.label: Tertiary White
channel-type.description: Changes the brightness of the third white LED

channel-type.label: Palettes
channel-type.description: Change the colours used by the FX

channel-type.label: Effect
channel-type.description: Use the built in FX

channel-type.label: Presets
channel-type.description: Auto rotate or change to a saved preset

channel-type.label: Playlists
channel-type.description: The currently playing play list

channel-type.label: Preset Duration
channel-type.description: Time for how long to show each preset for before moving to the next

channel-type.label: Grouping
channel-type.description: How many consecutive LEDs of the same segment will be grouped to the same color

channel-type.label: Spacing
channel-type.description: How many LEDs are turned off and skipped between each group

channel-type.label: Live Override
channel-type.description: Live data override. 0 is off, 1 is override until live data ends, 2 is override until ESP reboot

channel-type.label: Transform Time
channel-type.description: Time it takes to change/fade from one look to the next.

channel-type.label: FX Speed
channel-type.description: Change the speed of the FX

channel-type.label: FX Intensity
channel-type.description: Change the intensity of the FX

channel-type.label: Mirror Effect
channel-type.description: Mirror the effect for this segment

channel-type.label: Reverse Direction
channel-type.description: Reverse the direction of the current segment

channel-type.label: Sleep Timer
channel-type.description: Fade the level of light and turn off after set time

channel-type.label: Preset Cycle
channel-type.description: Cycle through the saved presets

channel-type.label: Sync Send
channel-type.description: Sends UDP packets that tell other WLED lights to follow this one.

channel-type.label: Sync Receive
channel-type.description: Allows UDP packets from other WLED lights to control this one.
